name: Robots don't like magnets
description:
This is a stealth-puzzle game where you try and get past robots, with only a magnet. Your magnet is a very powerful tool allowing you to move certain objects. You will need to move these objects to solve puzzles and sneak past the robots. You can move these objects by either attracting them or pushing them away. You can also push and pull yourself off of certain objects.

This game was made in 72 hours as a part of the Mini Jam 55 game jam.
